title: We need a new skin for Quinn
body: I was thinking about Northern assault Quinn {{champion:133}}  to counter Swains {{champion:50}}  Northern front skin since the demacia noxus rivalry. They should also add a couple more northern front skins like Northern front Katarina {{champion:55}}  or even Northern front Darius/Draven {{champion:122}} {{champion:119}}  along with a counter skin such as Northern assault Lux/Garen. {{champion:99}}{{champion:86}}

replies.body: I like all these ideas!
Aw man I'm glad a rioteer actual got a chance to look at this!

Funny thing is, the day after I answer this, RiotPenguin came and talked to me about the skin concepts he's doing for quinn :P

So there's some fun stuff in the works!

Hmm, RiotPenguin's doing it? Does that mean there's a chance it looks anything like this? 

http://imgur.com/rlCpiov
Only if Valor's model is replaced with a waddling penguin.
I loved the Quinn Bee drawing, its hilarious.

You know what I think makes a lot of sense? Love Bird Quinn. She has a journal(diary), she has a bird, and she has a quote with Jarvan 4th in it. Quinn could have a mad crush on PRINCE J4 (who could be like Today's American teen girl idol) and furiously write in her diary and dress valor up as a carrier pigeon/dove. She could even have a bunch of J4 posters.

But it seems like you guys don't do basic pallet (or even model) swap skins these days. If it doesn't have or support new particles, is it still something you might do?

I couldn't really see these having all new spell effects, a different model would absolutely suffice. Northern Front Swain doesn't have particle updates I believe, and that skin is still boss.
I was thinking ameriquinn. Turn valor into a bald eagle and add fireworks animations for other spells. Even better if valor also gets a top hat.
Seems more of like an july 4th kind of event type of skin

First a fire then an ice skin. Makes sense, as well as fitting with lore, good area to play with her visually. Heavy coat, amenities for Valor, strikingly different color palette (white, gray camo) from her other two skins. She's one of the earliest 1 skin and done champs. Really, I cannot think of a good reason *not* to have this skin made.
I'm glad you share the same love for Quinn with me
I'm disappointed my penQuinn idea never caught on.
Penquinn?
I just caught on I'm so sorry lmfao
Add a thunderbird or bird of prey skin. For bird of prey you could have Quinn with a crossbow and an eagle resting on her wrist.
Pokemon master Quinn
All joking aside, i was thinking of a commando quinn skin!
You, You're going places
i like the quinn{{champion:133}}  idea and katarina{{champion:55}}  but i do not think northern front sion{{champion:14}}  would look good

Well I think that the Northern area is like some sort of cold and barren land, like North Korea, you know. So Sion's ugliness matches where he belongs. If Sion is handsome and charming like Ahri's husband, than I'm sure it can't reflect the situation of the Northern land well.
but of course, it says in his lore EXPLICITLY "Sions days of conquest are over"
Well I mean he's on the norther front he's not conquering anything he's defending ._.

the northern front is something that is originated from WWII? its the front that was the coldest and the hardest to man with the weather. if anything, all sion got was the western front, the quietest front in a war.....usually

I know about the history behind that skin I'm just saying it's not hard to get a little imaginative. Take nasus for example he's not evil but they gave him an Infernal skin which would imo be an evil looking skin. All I'm saying is to open your mind up
I was thinking a Hawk Eye kinda thing or even a DragonSlayer {{champion:133}} seeing as theres a DragonSlayer{{champion:67}} an they both use cross bows
Quinn doesn't do %hp true damage, so dragons (or Shyvana) don't fear her as much ;)

Woad Scout Quinn's pretty close to your suggestion. :) Hope you like the new skin as much as I do.


Necros ftw.
There was a post a bit back of Blood Raven Quinn~ It's so pretty and the dark/red would compliment her very niceless. [Linky~](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3743527)
But there is already a red Quinn D:
